Robert Drivas https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Drivas 0 Robert Drivas (November 21, 1935 – June 29, 1986) was an American actor and theatre director. Robert_Drivas ( November_21_,_1935 – June_29_,_1986 ) was an_American_actor_and_theatre_director .
